meanings.definition: To make changes to the design of something.
meanings.sent1: She redesigns her room every year to make it look different.
meanings.sent2: The company redesigns its logo to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: He redesigns his sandwich by adding extra cheese and pickles.
meanings.sent4: The artist redesigns reality through the lens of imagination.
meanings.sent5: The architect redesigns the city skyline with futuristic buildings.

meanings.definition: The act of making changes to the design of something.
meanings.sent1: The redesigns of the website improved user experience.
meanings.sent2: The constant redesigns of the car model kept customers interested.
meanings.sent3: The redesigns of the garden made it a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent4: The redesigns of the fashion line reflected current trends.
meanings.sent5: The redesigns of the house transformed it into a modern masterpiece.
